title: Will the nice looking resumes please report to this forum?!
content: Anyone have any tips/examples (your own would be great) of splendid looking/ typographically awesome resumes? Everything I see is blah.
author: sohappy2

comments.content: Alessandro: can you link the page with all the articles written in that "advice for getting started" section? I can't seem to find the section of the AIGA site where that belongs to. Clicking the header brings me to an articale called "Presenting your portfolio", and that's it.
No, sorry, that is what I bookmarked time ago.
